summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Magnetic lashes-magnetic eyelashes, Reusable Natural Full Eye Deluxe Ultra Thin Magnetic eyelashes，one Eyelash Tweezers two Fake Lashes Storage Box -8pcs lashes Review Date: 2014/09/29 Store: Tysonir Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Tysonir', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Number of Pieces': '8', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Item Weight': '0.02 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 1.5 x 1.4 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': '820103447362', 'UPC': '820103447362'} Review Text: I blogged about this wonderful product on my website. www.beautynproducts.wordpress.com
This is what I had to say

My love for this company is steadily increasing over their packaging alone! I am a sucker for packaging. I am guilty of buying something simply because it comes wrapped in a pretty package. Crave is so clever in their packaging it makes me want every product they have to offer.
Guess what? Their products are just as awesome as what they come in. Last time, I got the Whip Lash Eye Lash curler, you can read my review here. This time I received their eyebrow kit!
It comes with two awesome tools to help me maintain my sorry excuse for eyebrows. The first tool has a comb to help me separate my clumpy ass eye lashes. Even with the best mascara you can get, it's always a good idea to keep a tool to separate your eyelashes. No one wants to see your spider lashes!! On the other side of the comb is a little brush you can use on your lashes, or your eyebrows.
The second tool, my favorite, has a mascara type applicator on one end, this applicator is great for grooming your eyebrows before you put on your makeup. It gets them looking even and neat, or to help accentuate your arch. The other end is an eyebrow makeup applicator brush. This small brush helps you apply your eyebrow makeup with precision. I highly recommend this product! Look at the cute tube it comes in! I am saving that, I don't know why or what I will ever use it for but I am never throwing it away :) Review Title: Oh the packaging is so cute Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Best Eye Cream for Wrinkles - Resveratrol + Shea Butter + Aloe Vera Juice + Jojoba Oil - Must Have Day/Night Cream for Under Eyes - Reduces Crow's Feet. Fine Lines & Sagging Skin Review Date: 2014/10/24 Store: Andre Lorent Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Andre Lorent', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.2 x 2.2 x 1.7 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '820103807227'} Review Text: This cream goes on smooth and silky and helps prevent wrinkles around your eyes. I wear this everyday because who wants crow feet?? I love Andre Lorent, the company always delivers luxurious products that are affordable. Review Title: Oh Andre Lorent, How I Love Thee Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Blackhead Remover Set - Best Comedone Extractor - Whitehead & Blemish Removal Tools - Bundle 3 Pieces Premium Blackhead Whitehead Comedone Acne Pimple Remover Extractor Spot Cleaner - 100% Lifetime. Review Date: 2014/12/11 Store: Veluxio Naturals Product Description: ['Looking to eliminate blackheads, whiteheads and acnes? Then look no further...', 'Veluxio Naturals Extractor Tools for Skin Care Set are designed for precision control and comfort use.', '--- Our Guarantee ---', "We personally guarantee our products are made to the highest standards, that's why we offer a", 'Lifetime Guarantee!', 'So what are you waiting for?', 'Click the add to cart button now', 'to get this top quality Skin Care Set on its way to your door.'] Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Veluxio Naturals', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Item Weight': '23 Grams', 'Unit Count': '3 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 0.98 x 0.2 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '784672622271', 'Manufacturer': 'Veluxio Naturals'} Review Text: These tools are perfect for people like me... OK so this might sound a little gross but if I have a prominent black head or pimple I can't just let it stay on my face. So I squeeze I pick I do what I need to do to remove it from my face. Sometimes I Pinch my skin so hard it breaks and bleeds which causes scarring and sometimes makes your pimples worse.

These tools make it easy to extract your pimples and black heads. You apply pressure on or around the pimple and these tools help squeeze them out. No broken skin, and it heals fast! I know they say picking is bad but face it, we're going to do it anyway, and blackheads don't usually go away without extraction. This tool set works perfectly.

I received this product in exchange for my unbiased review Review Title: They say don't pick... But if your going to anyway... Then this set is perfect for you Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pink Hair Brush Review Date: 2014/12/17 Store: THZY Product Description: ['FLAT IRON'] Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 2.9 x 1.7 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'VZ-DETBR-PK', 'UPC': '609595109299', 'Manufacturer': 'THZY'} Review Text: I have never seen a brush like this so I was hesitant. I have long thick hair and brushing my hair has always been a pain in the rear. This helps instantly detangle my hair. It is also super cute! It is pink and has designs on it. This also works great on my step daughter, she is 3 and gets fussy while I'm brushing her hair. This brush makes it hassle free. Review Title: I LOVE this brush Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bella And Bear Makeup Brush Set With Case - For Face And Eyes - Includes Foundation - Contouring - Blending - Blush And Eyeshadow Brushes - Vegan - Guide and Case Included Review Date: 2015/01/16 Store: Bella and Bear Product Description: ['Professional Makeup Brushes By Bella and Bear. A Beautiful 15 Piece Professional Brush Set with Deluxe Case. Lynx Kabuki Brush included. Makes A Great Gift For Women'] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Bella and Bear', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Eyeshadow, For Foundation', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '15', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Copper', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '10.2 x 7 x 2 inches', 'Item Weight': '1 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '10.2 x 7 x 2 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'MB12314', 'UPC': '642125694131', 'Manufacturer': 'OfficeMarket'} Review Text: First off, I was absolutely blow away with this brush set before I even opened the package. The box was very large and packed in a cute floral box titled "The Kitten"
I opened the box and pulled out a large black case, it was very soft and had a zipper with a heart attached to it. The Bella and Bear logo is embossed on the front of this case.
I hadn't even opened up the case and knew that these brushes were high quality.
When I did open it, I am pretty sure I heard angels singing lol (okay I admit it, I LOVE makeup, makeup brushes and all beauty products so this was super exciting)
Inside the case held the softest most luxurious feeling brushes I have ever used! The brushes laid neatly 4 sections, it opens like a book. The inside cover had brushes, then the middle "page" held brushes on both sides, and then the outer side of the case had the rest of brushes.
Each brush has it own unique name, the case comes with a leaflet with the names of each brush and explaining what they are used for. This is my 7th brush set and the ONLY one that actually showed what they are used for. I was pretty clueless and had to look them up online.
As for the use of the brushes, they work wonderful. It have yet to experience a single brush hair fall out. As I stated before they are so soft and feel so nice when I use them on my face. I love the fact that it comes with a small thin brush that I can use for my gel eyeliner. This set contains a brush for all of your makeup needs.
I highly recommend this as a present to yourself or for any makeup lover in your life. You will fall in love with them as much as I did! I have tried other products from this company and I am very impressed with their products and their packaging! It was a little dark in the room where I took the pictures so I wasn't able to get a clear pic of the makeup brushes inside the case but I assure you, they are to die for!
I received this product in exchange for an unbiased review and these opinions are 100% my own. Review Title: I think I might be in love!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Grow Longer Fuller Eyelashes - Long Eyelashes are Beautiful Eyelashes - Lashes in Bloom Promotes Eyelash Growth - Includes a Free eBook full of Natural Beauty Tips - This Advanced Eyelash Serum is Backed by Our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee - So Order Yours Today! Review Date: 2015/03/25 Store: Cheeva Beauty Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 0.8 x 0.8 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '820103892230 794168102767'} Review Text: So it took me a while to put up this review because I needed a while to see results and be honest about what I think. I fully believe this works, after using this for a couple of months my lashes have grown longer and even thicker. This is a more affordable option to other higher end brands. It is super easy to apply, you just swipe it above your lashes as if you were putting on eyeliner. It doesn't run into your eye (just make sure you apply correctly or it may cause slight irritation)
** I received this product at discount in exchange for an honest review. Review Title: I saw results after about 6 weeks. This REALLY works. Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history reveals a strong preference for beauty products, particularly those that enhance the appearance of eyes, such as lashes, eyeliners, and eyebrow tools. They exhibit a particular fondness for packaging, indicating that attractive presentation significantly influences their purchasing decisions. Additionally, high ratings often accompany products from brands they are loyal to, suggesting a commitment to quality.

Common themes in their product use include daily skincare routines aimed at achieving youthful skin, with an emphasis on products that address wrinkles and acne. They demonstrate a preference for effective, multi-functional tools that facilitate beauty routines, like makeup brushes and extraction tools for blemishes.

The person appears to have a moderate sensitivity to price, as they appreciate affordable alternatives without compromising on quality. This pattern suggests a balance between budget considerations and a desire for premium beauty experiences. Overall, this individual values aesthetics, functionality, and brand reliability, highlighting a dedication to maintaining a polished and well-groomed appearance.

target_interaction.title: Goes with the Dr. Song teeth whitening kit. A must have for sensitive teeth.
target_interaction.text: This goes with the Dr. Song teeth whitening kit, this is a must if you have sensitive teeth because it prevents any tooth pain associated with the whitening process. The actual kit worked very well for me, my teeth were whiter within just a few sessions.
target_interaction.title_meta: Dr Song 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Acne Treatment (6oz)
